author: ulerdogan
content:
Hello! I am Ula≈ü, RIP editor and co-author of RIP-7212. Before the next ACDE this week, I wanted to prepare a short brief (in my view, please correct me if I am wrong) to help with the decision of including the proposal in the Pectra hard fork. It includes history, current implementations summary, some debates, and my final view.

https://hackmd.io/@ulerdogan/B1QikMxdC
